VII.i.2.D.5.b
.
Example:  Multiple Marriages
Situation
:
The claimant married the Veteran on March 14, 1985.  The claimant divorced the Veteran on February 13, 1986.  The claimant and the Veteran remarried on September 29, 1989.  The Veteran died on August 5, 1990.  The surviving spouse files a claim for Survivors Pension on October 3, 1990.
Results
:
The one-year marriage requirement is
not
met because the two periods of marriage cannot be added together.
However, the claimant
does
satisfy the marriage dates requirement of
38 CFR 3.54
because the original marriage occurred before the delimiting date for Vietnam Era service (May 8, 1985).
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section D - Establishing Marital Relationship in Survivors Cases
